Package ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices

Input Devices (Sensors) and Output Devices

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDevice
    Generic functionality for input and output devices
    IInputProcessor  
    IOutDevice
    Device where the writing gets managed by the event loop
    IOutDeviceEx
    Device where the recalculation of parameters gets managed by the event loop
    IRecalculate
    Recalculation of parameters which can be attached to (output) devices
    ISensor
    Input Device
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameConsole
    Feed Throttle, Rudder, Aleron and Elevator from a Game Console to the ParameterStore.
    IMUDevice
    Integration device for the Inertial measurement unit (IMU) into our Flight Controller to determine the pitch, roll, yaw and heading.
    InputProcessor
    Default implementation of an imput processor where we can specify the parameter names
    InputProcessorWithPrefix
    input processor with the syntax [T|R|A|E]
    OutDevice
    Output Device which needs to be configured to implement the following flow: sensor =) scaler =) control =) IPwmOut.
    QuadMotorController
    Implementation of a simple motor controller for Quadrotors.
    Sensor
    Generic implementation for a sensor: It needs to be configured by defining the input processor and the input hardware (pin) / protocol.

Package ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices Description
